ygData.subject: Re: Another Newbie Question
ygData.msgSnippet: This is an answer to your previous post: Personally I think EQ is more involved than any of the MUDs I ve tried and the graphics blow me away. I always
ygData.messageBody:
This is an answer to your previous
post:<br><br>Personally I think EQ is more involved than any of the MUDs
I've tried and the graphics blow me away. I always
tried to use my imagination when playing MUDs and it
really helped but now that I play EQ I don't have to
because anything I can think of for the game in my
imagination is already on it or on the way.<br><br>Yes you do
have to pay $10 a month for it but that comes with
over 20 servers to choose from, patches, equipment
saves, and a whole lot of fun. Most people that I've run
into on my journeys have said that they would pay more
for what their getting because its so much fun. Plus
when you play as much as they do the price comes out
to less than 1 penny per hour.<br><br>Well anyways
thats my 2 cents
